definition: Xiangxi Tujia and Miao Autonomous Prefecture 湘西土家族苗族自治州[Xiang1 xi1 Tu3 jia1 zu2 Miao2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1]/western Hunan

Xiangxi Tujia and Miao autonomous prefecture in northwest Hunan, capital Jishou 吉首
pinyin: Xiang1 xi1 Tu3 jia1 zu2 Miao2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1
containing_words.word: 湘西土家族苗族自治州

sentences.english: Changde-Jishou expressway goes zigzag in the mountains of Xiangxi.
sentences.chinese: 常吉高速公路在湘西绵延的大山里穿行。

sentences.english: The Pyrite is one of main typomorphic characteristic of W-Sb-Au deposits series of western Hunan.
sentences.chinese: 黄铁矿是湘西钨锑金矿床系列的主要标型矿物之一。

sentences.english: Second, analyze the impact of factors that influence organizational structure of Xiangxi tobacco leaf industry .
sentences.chinese: 其次，分析了影响湘西州烟叶产业组织结构的因素。

sentences.english: Hunan cuisine consists of local Cuisines of Xiangjiang Region, Dongting Lake and Xiangxi coteau.
sentences.chinese: 湘菜由湘江地区，洞亭湖和湘西的地方菜肴组成。

sentences.english: A special brittle ductile shear zone crops out in the Baisha town of Luyan county, western Hunan.
sentences.chinese: 湘西泸阳县白沙镇西发育了一条特殊的脆韧性剪切带。

sentences.english: Xiangxi minorities are cheering for the expressway opening.
sentences.chinese: 湘西少数民族群众为这条“富民路”的开通而欢腾。

sentences.english: We should implement systematical marketing and elastic price strategy of big XiangXi exorcism Culture.
sentences.chinese: 实施大湘西傩文化一体化营销策略和灵活性定价策略。

sentences.english: Shen Congwen's fictions of "Xiangxi" (the west part of Hunan Province) of subject matters are saturated with the spirit of Daoist art.
sentences.chinese: 沈从文的湘西题材小说浸透了道家艺术精神。

sentences.english: Tian Men Mountain Temple was first built in the Tang Dynasty as a center of Buddhism in the area of western Hunan.
sentences.chinese: 天门山寺始建于唐朝，是湘西地区的佛教中心。

sentences.english: The Woxl-fault in western Hunan is a brittle shear zone characterized by shearing—sliding along its strike.
sentences.chinese: 湘西沃溪断裂为一具走向剪切滑移性质的脆性剪切带。

sentences.english: The singing artistry of Miao Ethnic Group's folksongs is an important part of our national ethnic vocal music.
sentences.chinese: 湘西苗歌的演唱艺术是我国民族声乐的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: He focused on the natural life of Xiangxi.
sentences.chinese: 他把目光投向了湘西自然的生命形态。

sentences.english: This method is called "The driving dead body".
In Western Hunan, the Miao people have their own parties of love songs.
sentences.chinese: 在大湘西，“赶边边场”是苗族特有的情歌会。

sentences.english: Drum Dance is a wonder among the unique folk arts performed and inherited by the Miao ethnic group that resides in Xiangxi (west Hunan Province) .
sentences.chinese: “湘西苗族鼓舞”是湘西苗族民间艺苑中的一枝奇葩。

sentences.english: Drum Dance is a wonder among the unique folk arts performed and inherited by the Miao ethnic group that resides in Xiangxi (west Hunan Province) .
sentences.chinese: “湘西苗族鼓舞”是湘西苗族民间艺苑中的一枝奇葩。
